001package org.consensusj.bitcoinj.signing;
002
003import org.bitcoinj.base.Coin;
004import org.bitcoinj.base.Sha256Hash;
005import org.bitcoinj.core.TransactionOutPoint;
006import org.bitcoinj.script.Script;
007
008import java.util.Objects;
009
010/**
011 *  UTXO info for transaction signing. Immutable and all fields non-nullable.
012 *  <p>Non-segwit can be signed without amount, but we're focusing on modern Bitcoin, so
013 *  we're going to simplify things by making {@link Utxo.Signable} mandatory in many methods.
014 */
015public interface Utxo {
016    Sha256Hash txId();
017    int index();
018
019    static Basic of(Sha256Hash txId, int index) {
020        return new Basic(txId, index);
021    }
022
023    static Signable of(Sha256Hash txId, int index, Coin amount) {
024        return new Signable(txId, index, amount);
025    }
026
027    static Complete of(Sha256Hash txId, int index, Coin amount, Script scriptPubKey) {
028        return new Complete(txId, index, amount, scriptPubKey);
029    }
030
031    static Utxo of(TransactionOutPoint outPoint) {
032        if (outPoint.getConnectedOutput() == null || outPoint.getConnectedOutput().getValue() == null) {
033            throw new IllegalArgumentException("outpoint is not complete enough: no value ");
034        }
035        if (outPoint.getConnectedOutput().getScriptPubKey() == null) {
036            return new Signable(outPoint.hash(), (int) outPoint.index(), outPoint.getConnectedOutput().getValue());
037        } else {
038            return new Signable(outPoint.hash(), (int) outPoint.index(), outPoint.getConnectedOutput().getValue());
039        }
040    }
041
042    /**
043     * Bare minimum UTXO info: txId and index
044     */
045    class Basic implements Utxo {
046        private final Sha256Hash txId;
047        private final int index;
048
049        public Basic(Sha256Hash txId, int index) {
050            this.txId = Objects.requireNonNull(txId);
051            this.index = index;
052        }
053
054        @Override
055        public Sha256Hash txId() {
056            return txId;
057        }
058
059        @Override
060        public int index() {
061            return index;
062        }
063
064        Signable addAmount(Coin amount) {
065            return Utxo.of(txId, index, amount);
066        }
067    }
068
069    /**
070     * UTXO with "amount" which is necessary for signing a segwit transaction.
071     */
072    class Signable implements Utxo {
073        private final Sha256Hash txId;
074        private final int index;
075        private final Coin amount;
076
077        public Signable(Sha256Hash txId, int index, Coin amount) {
078            this.txId = Objects.requireNonNull(txId);
079            this.index = index;
080            this.amount = Objects.requireNonNull(amount);
081        }
082
083        @Override
084        public Sha256Hash txId() {
085            return txId;
086        }
087
088        @Override
089        public int index() {
090            return index;
091        }
092
093        public Coin amount() {
094            return amount;
095        }
096    }
097
098    /**
099     * UTXO with {@code amount} and {@code scriptPubKey}. Everything needed to build a transaction input with
100     * {@code scriptSig} to spend this output.
101     */
102    class Complete implements Utxo {
103        private final Sha256Hash txId;
104        private final int index;
105        private final Coin amount;
106        private final Script scriptPubKey;
107
108        public Complete(Sha256Hash txId, int index, Coin amount, Script scriptPubKey) {
109            this.txId = Objects.requireNonNull(txId);
110            this.index = index;
111            this.amount = Objects.requireNonNull(amount);
112            this.scriptPubKey = Objects.requireNonNull(scriptPubKey);
113        }
114
115        @Override
116        public Sha256Hash txId() {
117            return txId;
118        }
119
120        @Override
121        public int index() {
122            return index;
123        }
124
125        public Coin amount() {
126            return amount;
127        }
128
129        public Script scriptPubKey() {
130            return scriptPubKey;
131        }
132    }
133}
